Post.title: Ubuntu
Post._content:
###   

##### 1.
```
$ sudo apt-get remove <package>
```
##### 2.
```
$ sudo apt-get --purge remove <package>
```
##### 3.
```
$ sudo apt-get autoremove <package>
```
##### 4. /var/cache/apt/archives/ deb
```
$ sudo apt-get autoclean <package>
```
##### 5. /var/cache/apt/archives/ deb
```
$ sudo apt-get clean
```
###   

```cmd
// 
$ sudo apt-get --purge remove <package>
// 
$ sudo apt-get autoremove <package>
// dpkgrc
$ sudo dpkg -l | grep ^rc | awk '{print $2}' | sudo xargs dpkg -P
```
Post.raw:

title: Ubuntu

categories: [-linux]
tags: [ubuntu]

###   

##### 1.
```
$ sudo apt-get remove <package>
```
##### 2.
```
$ sudo apt-get --purge remove <package>
```
##### 3.
```
$ sudo apt-get autoremove <package>
```
##### 4. /var/cache/apt/archives/ deb
```
$ sudo apt-get autoclean <package>
```
##### 5. /var/cache/apt/archives/ deb
```
$ sudo apt-get clean
```
###   

```cmd
// 
$ sudo apt-get --purge remove <package>
// 
$ sudo apt-get autoremove <package>
// dpkgrc
$ sudo dpkg -l | grep ^rc | awk '{print $2}' | sudo xargs dpkg -P
```

Post.title: ubuntu
Post._content:
#### <font color="#f00">1. device not managed</font>
**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  /etc/NetworkManager/NetworkManager.conf
```bash
$ sudo gedit /etc/NetworkManager/NetworkManager.conf
```
managed=falsemanaged=true

**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  network-manager service
```bash
$ sudo service network-manager restart
```
#### <font color="#f00">2. UbuntuSublime Text 3</font>
**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  ()
```bash
$ sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
```

**<font color="#00f">:</font>**   
```
$ git clone https://github.com/lyfeyaj/sublime-text-imfix.git
```

**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  
```bash
$ cd sublime-text-imfix && ./sublime-imfix
```
!  Sublime Text 2/3   Fcitx! : 

![ubuntusublime text](ubuntuTip/1.png)

#### <font color="#f00">3. Ubuntu</font>
![Ubuntu](ubuntuTip/3.png)
**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  
```bash
$ cd ~
$ cd .config/
```

![](ubuntuTip/2.png)

**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  
```bash
$ rm -rf SogouPY
$ rm -rf SogouPY.users
$ rm -rf sogou-qimpanel
```

**<font color="#00f">:</font>**  

#### <font color="#f00">4. Ubuntu Node nvm</font>
```bash
// terminalnvmnodenpm
$ curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/creationix/nvm/v0.29.0/install.sh | bash
```

##   Cisco VPN
#### 1.  Cisco VPN

```bash
// root
$ su
// vpnc
# apt-get install vpnc
// vpnc
# vpnc
// 
```
![vpnc](ubuntuVpn/1.png)

#### 2.  Cisco VPN
```bash
//  ifconfig  Cisco VPN 
# ifconfig
```
![ifconfig Cisco VPN](ubuntuVpn/2.png)

#### 3.  Cisco VPN
```bash
//  vpnc-disconnect  Cisco VPN
# vpnc-disconnect
```

##  Cisco VPN
####   Cisco VPN
```
$ sudo apt-get install network-manager-vpnc network-manager-vpnc-gnome
```

####  Network Connections  Cisco Compatible VPN(vpnc)
![ Cisco VPN](ubuntuVpn/3.png)

####   Create...  Gateway()User name()User password()Group name()Group password() Save 
![ Cisco VPN ](ubuntuVpn/4.png)

####   VPN Connections  Cisco VPN VPN connection 1 Cisco VPN
![ Cisco VPN](ubuntuVpn/5.png)
